MWC.GUI.Shapes

Interface DraggableItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteTMASegment, ArcShape, CircleShape, CompositeTrackWrapper, CoreTMASegment, DynamicInfillSegment, DynamicPolygonShapeWrapper, DynamicShapeWrapper, EllipseShape, FurthestOnCircleShape, Grid4WPainter, LabelWrapper, LineShape, PlainShape, PlanningSegment, PlanningSegment.ClosingSegment, PolygonShape, PolygonWrapper, RangeRingShape, RectangleShape, RelativeTMASegment, ShapeWrapper, TextLabel, TrackSegment, TrackWrapper, VectorShape, WheelShape

    public interface DraggableItem
    marker interface for objects that can be dragged on-screen
    Author:
    ian.mayo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DraggableItem.LocationConstruct
      composite object used for finding nearest dragable items

        paint the shape onto the destination. note that the subject knows where to plot itself to

      • findNearestHotSpotIn

        void findNearestHotSpotIn(java.awt.Point cursorPos,
                          WorldLocation cursorLoc,
                          DraggableItem.LocationConstruct currentNearest,
                          Layer parentLayer,
                          Layers theLayers)
        ok - see how far we are from the cursor
        Parameters:
        cursorPos - the current mouse cursor position
        cursorLoc - that position in world coordinates
        currentNearest - the 'running total' of nearest points
        parentLayer - the layer to update when drag is complete

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        get the name of the item, so we can place a detailed description on the undo buffer
        Returns:
        name of this item
